description: Professional web copywriting patterns — headlines, CTAs, social proof, industry-specific language

benefit_driven: The {Noun} That {Benefit} — e.g., The Platform That Scales With You
{Outcome} Without {Pain Point} — e.g., Enterprise Security Without the Complexity
Stop {Pain}. Start {Benefit}. — e.g., Stop Guessing. Start Knowing.
From {Bad State} to {Good State} — e.g., From Chaos to Clarity

hero_headline_patterns.question: What If Your {Tool} Actually Worked?
hero_headline_patterns.outcome_led: Build, Deploy, and Scale — All In One Place
hero_headline_patterns.pain_point_led: Tired of {Pain}? There's a Better Way.

subheadline_patterns: Everything you need to {goal} — from {start} to {finish}.

cta_placement_rules: After pricing: CTA on each tier card
Bottom CTA section: Large, centered, with supporting copy
Nav: Ghost 'Sign In' + Primary 'Get Started' on right side
cta_copy_rules: Start with a verb: Start, Get, Try, Build, Launch, Join
Arrow → on primary CTAs adds forward momentum
Reduce friction: 'No credit card required' below CTA
Ghost CTA for secondary action: 'Watch Demo' or 'Learn More'

logo_bar.css: opacity: 0.4 on logos, centered row, small text above: 'Trusted by teams at'
logo_bar.notes: Use 4-6 logos max. Grayscale/desaturated. Don't use logos larger than the actual brand

stat_counters.notes: Use real-sounding numbers. Round numbers feel fake. '12,847' feels realer than '12,000'

good_quotes: '{Product} transformed how our team works. We shipped 3x faster in the first month.' — {Name}, CTO at {Company}
'The best tool we've adopted this year. Period.' — {Name}, VP Engineering at {Company}
'We evaluated 12 tools before choosing {Product}. No regrets.' — {Name}, Founder at {Company}
testimonials.notes: Short quotes (1-2 sentences) > long paragraphs. Include specific results when possible.

subheader: Powerful features that grow with your team.
Everything you need, nothing you don't.
Tools that adapt to how you work.
Start free. Upgrade when you're ready.
Pay only for what you use.
No credit card required. Free forever plan available.
Set up in 5 minutes. Cancel anytime.

never_use: Welcome to our platform — too generic
We are the best — unsubstantiated claim
Lorem ipsum — always use real-sounding copy
Our mission is to... — nobody cares about your mission on a landing page
We leverage cutting-edge technology — buzzword soup

replace_with.Welcome to X: Ship Faster With X / Build Better With X
replace_with.Learn more: See How It Works / View Demo
replace_with.Submit: Send Message / Create Account / Start Trial
